titles.title: Authorizing the Speaker to declare recesses subject to the call of the Chair from January 5, 1996, through January 23, 1996; waiving a requirement of clause 4(b) of rule XI with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules during that period.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-445, by Ms. Pryce.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 174.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 224 - 190 (Roll no. 8).

bill.summary: 1/3/1996--Introduced. Authorizes the Speaker of the House of Representatives to declare specified recesses subject to the call of the Chair from January 5 through 23, 1996. Waives a requirement of rule XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives for a two-thirds vote to consider a report from the Committee on Rules on the same day it is presented to the House with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the House Rules Committee before January 24, 1996, providing for consideration of bills making general or continuing FY 1996 appropriations, increasing or waiving the public debt limit, or providing for a balanced budget by 2002.
